span.a: Please Click Here for Details to Access the 4.28.20 Virtual Board Meeting

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.p: The Morris Plains School District will hold their April 28, 2020 Board Meeting remotely via video conference, beginning at 7:00pm. During the meeting, they will present the 2020-2021 Final Budget.

a.title: Go to comments for April 28, 2020 - Virtual Board Meeting

div.p: Please click the headline to access the latest COVID-19 updates.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Timeline and Parent Resources

img.alt: EFMP - Strides for Education 5k Walk has been cancelled

a.span: EFMP - Strides for Education 5k Walk has been cancelled

div.p: Please note the EFMP 5K fundraiser, scheduled for May 31st, has been cancelled. The date will be rescheduled to a later time in the fall.

a.title: Go to comments for EFMP - Strides for Education 5k Walk has been cancelled

div.p: The 2019 spring administration of the NJSLA has been cancelled.

a.title: Go to comments for Spring Standardized Assessments Cancelled

div.p: The 2020-2021 MPSD school calendar was approved at the 2.11.20 board meeting.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020-2021 MPSD Calendar
